title: New Champion idea : Scarlet, The yordle illusionist (don't judge)
body:
I have an idea for a new champion since I saw some of the ways Kindred use their kit and came up with a few ideas of how a different champ could use these.
(I have no drawing ability so there will be no art unless someone for some reason wants to draw what they think my champ should look like based on my description)
So I hope this description of them would help create a mental image. They are a yordle from Bandle City that has the power to create great illusions of others some that are so powerful that they can take on almost the exact properties of those that she copy and is able to unleash their ultimate abilities over their own team mates. they are a female with a red colour scheme with an old cape with a hood covering most of her face and a medallion made of a magical substance that is the source of her powers.
(and oh yeah there is allot of things to read so if you don't like reading you should probably leave :3)

I am thinking about scarlet being a mix between AD and AP and you could be able to build either on her and still be able to carry play well in most games.

Statistics:
HP - 497-1871 (80.8 per lv)
HP Regeneration - 1.7 - 8.3 (0.39 per lv)
Mana - 293-1636 (79 mana per lv)
Ranged - 500
AD - 50 - 97 (2.76 per lv)
Attack Speed - 0.625 (+0% – 39.1%)
Armor - 19.3-80.84 (3.62 per lv)
Magic Resist - 30
Movement Speed - 335

Friends - {{champion:45}} 
Rivals - {{champion:17}} 

Ill start with what I feel is the most creative part of my champions kit their ultimate:
R- Mirror Move
Like Kindred's passive with the marking you would have the same menu above your health bar with all enemy champions icons on it. when you select a champion on your menu your ultimate becomes a slightly toned down version of theirs. for example if you where to mark Karthus it would only do 3/4 of the original damage but would still have the same AP scaling. Same as if you mark a Jinx and then ult your rocket would only deal 3/4 of what Jinx's ult would do but would still keep the exact same AD scaling. the mark will be removed from the champion that you had done it on after you used their ultimate. you would not be able to mark that champion again until you have used a different champions ultimate. every time you mark a champion you would not be able to mark a different champion for 60 seconds. The ultimate would also have the same cool-down as the champions that you marked. (Jinx ult has a 90 second cool-down so your ult would have the same if you had used her ultimate and no amount of CDR can change this) this will not be able to copy their ultimate's passive such as {{champion:82}}  being able to control a dragon through his ultimate as that would be way to overpowered.

E - Seeing Double - Cooldown 15/12/11/10/9.5 Base Damage 80/90/100/110/120 Physical Damage
A skill shot that scales with Scarlet's 60% AP and 65% of her AD that throws an illusion of her towards an enemy if it makes contact with them they will have the same effect as a graves W (or nocturne ult) and will not be able to see within a reduced radius for 2 seconds. 

W - Pool of vision - Cooldown 40 seconds Base Heal - 30/50/70/90/110 Heal per second
Scarlet turns into a reflective liquid on the ground and will heal depending on her level as well as 40% of her AP and cannot be targeted for 3 seconds any knock ups (such as Zac's E and Malphites R will instantly remove scarlet form this state). Scarlet will not be able to move throughout the duration of the ability allowing your team (or the enemy) to set up for a gank.

Q - Mirror shard - Cooldown 9/8/7/6/5 Base Damage 70/90/110/130/150 Magic Damage
A long ranged skill shot that shoots mirror shards at your opponent and deals 50% of your AD and 60% of your AP

Passive - Mirrored Attacks
Every auto attack will place a stack of Scarlet's passive onto an enemy and for each stack (max 3) you will deal an extra 10 Physical Damager to them.

Thanks for reading! post what you think below or if you have a lore for her and a few changes I should make please say :3
(ps sorry for writing so much)

I became bored since my league isn't working at the moment so i came up with this (might be a bit broken but meh)

Argus
The Celestial Guardian

Stats:
Hp: 580 (+80 per level)
Mana: 320 (+35 per level)
Attack Damage: 53 (+3 per level)
Attack Speed: 0.682 (+1% per level)
Movement Speed: 330 
Health Regen: 8.752 (+0.82% per level)
Mana Regen: 6.246 (+0.40% per level)
Armour:30 (+1.5 per level)
Magic Resist:31 (+1 per level)


Abilities and Passive:

Passive: (Celestial Markings)
Whenever Argus basic attacks a Minion or Champion he applies a stack of "Celestial Markings" (Max = 5) Apon reaching 5 stacks Argus's next basic attack or 
ability will cause all stacks to detonate dealing 20 (+10% of Argus's AD)(per stack) in True Damage and slow by 40% for 3 seconds.

Ability 1 (Q): (Sacred Grounds)
Argus converts the ground in a 650 Unit Radius into Sacred Grounds damaging all enemies that remain in the area by 60(+50% of Argus's AP) as magic damage
per second for six seconds. If Argus is inside the area of effect he will be healed 30% of all the damage that enemies take within the area.

Ability 2 (W): (Eternal Follower)
Passive: Argus permanently gains a Minion follower that will attack any enemy Argus targets or is damaged by. Minion has 400(+25% of Argus's Max Health)
as health points. Minion has 40 (+40% of Argus's AD) as AD. Minions share Argus's movement speed. Argus gains another minion at lvls 6/12/18 Max number
Minions is 4

Active: Argus can order his minions to follow Target Ally Champion or minion untill Target dies or Argus leaves the Radius (1250 Units) if Minions that
are following Target Ally kill an enemy minion or Champion the gold and score go to the Target Ally, additionally ally champion will be healed 50% of minion's
max health when they are killed.

Ability 3 (E): (Through the gates)
Argus places down a portal in an area of 300 Units which will teleport everything that walks on it to selected structure (e.g Red tower or Blue inhib: Nexus
and nexus turrets cannot be selected) after Argus or allied/enemy champs go through the portal they gain 60% increased movement speed which rapidly decays at 5% a
second. If selected building is a turret the turret will be unable to attack and will become untargetable for 3 seconds.

Passive: Argus permantly gains 10% spellvamp per point in this ability

Ability 4 (R): (Gift of the Ancients)
Argus sacrifices 50% of his Current Hp and gives it to an Allied champion or minion. this ability will channel for 2 seconds before complete. both Argus
and targeted ally champion will become unable to move during this time and every enemy within 650 Units will be snared. The %hp that Argus gives to an allied
champion or minion will become a sheild which will last 8 seconds before Rapidly decaying.

this is a little something me and my friend did while bored...

Zen, The Mysterious Illusionist

Lore: Zen has seen many dark and evil things in the world of Valoran.
At a young age Zen witnessed the deaths of his parents to creatures he later discovered came from the shadow isles.
Furious and Desperate to avenge his family he studied many forms of destructive magic,
However he was only able to successfully master one of these magic techniques.
This magic allows the caster to fabricate an object from his mind, including things his currently veiwing.
the magic is illegal almost everywhere in Valoran so Zen decided to practise his magic on a remote island just off the coast of the shadow isles,
Zen recently learned of the dark beings that are currently compeating at the League of Legends, enraged by this monstrosity he decided to join the league of legends,
and attempt to purge it of all evil and dark creatures, both from the Void and the Shadow isles.

Passive: (Copycat) Whenever Zen uses an ability he leaves behind a copy of himself with 50% (+10% of Zen's current Health) that lasts for 6 seconds,
After the 6 seconds have passed this copy will implode pulling and slowing enemies by 30% for 2 seconds within a 250 unit Radius and,
dealing 60-80-100-120 (+60% of Zen's AP) as Magic Damage to caught within it.

Q: (Mirror) Zen creates a copy of Target champion that lasts for 180 seconds. Whenever Target champion uses an ability the copy will duplicate this ability sending it to the Target champion,
dealing 50% (+25% of Zen's Ap) as Percent health magic damage.

Passive: Zen's Abilities cooldown is reduced by 2% per 20 AP

W: (Confuse) If used on minions: Enemy minions will act like they are your minions and attack other enemies nearby dealing 20 (+10% of Zen's AP) as Magic Damage.
If used on a large/Small Monster: Will disable attacks for 3 seconds and dealing 40(+35% of Zen's Ap) as Magic Damage over 3 seconds.
If used on a Champion: Zen confuses the enemy champion silencing them and reducing their AD by 30(+15% of Zen's AP) and Dealing 40(+50% of Zen's AP) as Magic Damage for 5 seconds

E: (Unstable Aura) Passive: Whenever Zen takes any form of damage he begins channeling energy through his body, Apon hitting 50 charges (Max = 100) Zen will gain a sheild that absorbs 120(+60% of Zen's AP) of all damage
Apon hitting 100 Charges Zen begins to overflow with Mysterious energy dealing 40(+80% of Zen's AP) as Magic damage per second and Draining 5 charges each second until reaching 10 charges

R: (Army of Souls) Zen creates a Duplicate of Everything (excluding Champions) within 1250-2000 Units. the Duplicates can be ordered to attack enemies Dealing 20(+50% of Target's AD)(+50% of Zen's AD and AP) as True Damage.
Duplicates have 100(+100% of Zen's AP) as Health points. Duplicates will Implode after 300 seconds Dealing 100(+60% of Zen's Ap) as Magic damage.
